mapper.sql: a.mediate_program_id AS "mediateProgramId", a.relation_id AS "relationId", a.mediator AS "mediator", a.clerk AS "clerk", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.patient AS "patient", a.doctor AS "doctor", a.other AS "other", a.case_info AS "caseInfo", a.address AS "address", d.label AS "addressLabel", a.meeting_time AS "meetingTime", a.meeting_frequency AS "meetingFrequency", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doctor_avoid AS "doctorAvoid", a.patient_avoid AS "patientAvoid", a.patient_clear AS "patientClear", a.doctor_clear AS "doctorClear", a.doctor_content AS "doctorContent", a.patient_content AS "patientContent", u3.name AS "mediatorUser.name", u4.name AS "clerkuser.name", u7.name AS "doctorOffice.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIATE_PROGRAM( mediate_program_id, relation_id, mediator, clerk, user_id, patient, doctor, other, case_info, address, meeting_time, meeting_frequency, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, doctor_avoid, patient_avoid, patient_clear, doctor_clear, patient_content, doctor_content ) VALUES ( #{mediateProgramId}, #{relationId}, #{mediator}, #{clerk}, #{user.id}, #{patient}, #{doctor}, #{other}, #{caseInfo}, #{address}, #{meetingTime}, #{meetingFrequency}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{doctorAvoid}, #{patientAvoid}, #{patientClear}, #{doctorClear}, #{patientContent}, #{doctorContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEDIATE_PROGRAM SET mediate_program_id = #{mediateProgramId}, relation_id = #{relationId}, mediator = #{mediator}, clerk = #{clerk}, user_id = #{user.id}, patient = #{patient}, doctor = #{doctor}, other = #{other}, case_info = #{caseInfo}, address = #{address}, meeting_time = #{meetingTime}, meeting_frequency = #{meetingFrequency}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, doctor_avoid=#{doctorAvoid}, patient_avoid = #{patientAvoid}, patient_clear = #{patientClear}, doctor_clear = #{doctorClear} WHERE mediate_program_id = #{mediateProgramId}
